title: Pluralsight - AngularJS Fundamentals [2013] JS-Dev
description:
No exercise files in this one. From my own experience that is a good thing, I learn so much more when I create my own websites to apply the exercises to since you have to think a little and not just copy exactly what is done in the video.

If anyone needs anything else regarding JavaScript please ask in the comments and I'll do my best to get it. 

If you like this course and can afford it please consider to get a subscription on Pluralsight, it's not expensive. 


--------------
Authored by: Eames , Cooper 
Duration: 6h 14m
Level: Intermediate
Released: 5/17/2013 


This course will teach you the AngularJS fundamentals required to create testable, MVC-style single page applications with AngularJS.


In this course you will learn how simple it is to use AngularJS to create maintainable and testable single page applications. You will learn how to: bootstrap your AngularJS application; use AngularJS markup and expressions; create and use controllers; use built-in services and create custom services; turn your application into a SPA using routing; and create your own custom elements and handle events using directives. You will also learn how AngularJS allows you to do all thing using test-driven-development.
